edu.cwru.sepia.environment.model.history

Class EventLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.environment.model.history.EventLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeepEquatable, java.io.Serializable

    public class EventLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, DeepEquatable
    Logs all the primitive logs including damage, death, birth, upgrade, etc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
